de.mrapp.textmining.util.tokenizer

Class AbstractToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.textmining.util.tokenizer.AbstractToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tokenizer.Token, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NGramTokenizer.NGram, Substring

    public abstract class AbstractToken
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tokenizer.Token
    An abstract base class for all tokens.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                     @NotNull java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> positions)
        Creates a new token, which consists of a sequence of characters.
        Parameters:
        token - The token as a String. The token may neither be null, nor empty
        positions - A collection, which contains the position(s) of the token in the original text, as an instance of the type Collection. The collection may not be null

      • AbstractToken

                     @NotNull java.lang.String token,
                     @NotNull
                     int... positions)
        Creates a new token, which consists of a sequence of characters.
        Parameters:
        token - The token as a String. The token may neither be null, nor empty
        positions - An array, which contains the position(s) of the token in the original text as an Integer array. The array may neither be null, nor empty
